41.ara-name: كتاب العلم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn Ka'b bin Malik:from his father that he heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saying: "Whoever seeks knowledge to contend with the scholars, or to use it to argue with the fools, and to have people's faces turn towards him, then he shall be admitted to the Fire

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ يَطْلُبُ بِعِلْمِهِ الدُّنْيَا
chapter.eng-name: About One Who Seeks The World With His Knowledge
